00047 #pragma once
00048 #ifndef AI_CAMERA_H_INC
00049 #define AI_CAMERA_H_INC
00050 
00051 #include "types.h"
00052 
00053 #ifdef __cplusplus
00054 extern "C" {
00055 #endif
00056 
00057 // ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00100 struct aiCamera
00101 {
00108     C_STRUCT aiString mName;
00109 
00115     C_STRUCT aiVector3D mPosition;
00116 
00117 
00126     C_STRUCT aiVector3D mUp;
00127 
00128 
00136     C_STRUCT aiVector3D mLookAt;
00137 
00138 
00145     float mHorizontalFOV;
00146 
00152     float mClipPlaneNear;
00153 
00162     float mClipPlaneFar;
00163 
00164 
00172     float mAspect;
00173 
00174 #ifdef __cplusplus
00175 
00176     aiCamera()
00177         : mUp               (0.f,1.f,0.f)
00178         , mLookAt           (0.f,0.f,1.f)
00179         , mHorizontalFOV    (0.25f * (float)AI_MATH_PI)
00180         , mClipPlaneNear    (0.1f)
00181         , mClipPlaneFar     (1000.f)
00182         , mAspect           (0.f)
00183     {}
00184 
00188     void GetCameraMatrix (aiMatrix4x4& out) const
00189     {
00193         aiVector3D zaxis = mLookAt;     zaxis.Normalize();
00194         aiVector3D yaxis = mUp;         yaxis.Normalize();
00195         aiVector3D xaxis = mUp^mLookAt; xaxis.Normalize();
00196 
00197         out.a4 = -(xaxis * mPosition);
00198         out.b4 = -(yaxis * mPosition);
00199         out.c4 = -(zaxis * mPosition);
00200 
00201         out.a1 = xaxis.x;
00202         out.a2 = xaxis.y;
00203         out.a3 = xaxis.z;
00204 
00205         out.b1 = yaxis.x;
00206         out.b2 = yaxis.y;
00207         out.b3 = yaxis.z;
00208 
00209         out.c1 = zaxis.x;
00210         out.c2 = zaxis.y;
00211         out.c3 = zaxis.z;
00212 
00213         out.d1 = out.d2 = out.d3 = 0.f;
00214         out.d4 = 1.f;
00215     }
00216 
00217 #endif
00218 };
00219 
00220 
00221 #ifdef __cplusplus
00222 }
00223 #endif
00224 
00225 #endif // AI_CAMERA_H_INC
